name: Lost in Vivo
description: A horror game about claustrophobia. During a storm your service dog is forced down a broken sewer drain. You find the nearest sewer entrance and run in after it. Along the way you will meet others that are also stricken by abnormal or psychological fear.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel Core 2 2.66 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB Intregraded graphics Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: Intel i7 3.60GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB NVIDIA Geoforce
